title: LeaveBuster
body: I was starting a match then the game crashed and i get the LeaveBuster what is this?????? pls fix it

replies.body: An account can receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty after leaving multiple games and just one.  I'd like to help troubleshoot whatever is causing the crash to prevent further penalties, but need more info.  When you say crash what do you mean exactly, and are there error messages?  Let me know.

the computer crashed and doesnt move then the game quit
and I have the LeaveBuster no error masseges

If I understand correctly, the game froze and closed out.  You might have bad game files or driver that's causing this, so I suggest running through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this.  I hope that helps!

Sorry but I think that getting a LeaveBuster notice for just one game is dumb. 

Allow me to explain,

If one is in a position where the team is not cooperative during champ select and you don't wanna come along for the ride, I think it should be acceptable for one game. Especially for players who are constantly playing good games and don't leave games normally. "This was the first game I had to dodge in a while, and I find it unfair that I'm being penalized for something that was instigated by another summoner." <-- It's that kind of feeling I'm talking about and I'm sure many other summoners can understand, there are plenty of people in the community who are unreasonable, noncooperative, INSTALOCKERS. It's frustrating. Especially when you're the one penalized.

I was redirected here to give my 2 cents on anything I think Riot could improve upon. Would be cool to get a response, would be cool to see a change, but if not no worries. I like playing League other than that. 

Cheers
